overview: When an egomaniacal asshole of a congressman gets turned down by a woman, he becomes obsessed with winning her over. The compulsion sends him spiraling into the dark-side of deviant sexual behavior. Starring Chanel Preston as the relentless dom, Karla Kush as the rich spoiled wife, Riley Reid as the sexy escort and Cassidy Klein as a salivating sex slave. With Steven St. Croix as the Chief of Staff, Tommy Pistol as a reluctant male sex slave and Michael Vegas as the tyrannical congressman.
title: Shades of Kink 4
